item.title: Bonjour tout le monde !
item.dc:creator: marouane216
item.content:encoded: Bienvenue sur WordPress. Ceci est votre premier article. Modifiez-le ou supprimez-le, puis commencez à écrire !

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Bonjour, ceci est un commentaire. Pour débuter avec la modération, la modification et la suppression de commentaires, veuillez visiter l’écran des Commentaires dans le Tableau de bord. Les avatars des personnes qui commentent arrivent depuis Gravatar.

item.title: Accueil
item.dc:creator: marouane216
item.excerpt:encoded: Affiche les articles sur la page d’accueil ou sur la page des articles si une page d’accueil statique est définie.

item.title: Company
item.dc:creator: marouane216
item.content:encoded:
Company

The New York Times is dedicated to helping people understand the world through on-the-ground, expert and deeply reported independent journalism.

Mission and Values

At The Times, our mission and values guide the work we do every day. By acting in their spirit, we serve readers and society, ensure the continued strength of our journalism and business, and foster a healthy and vibrant Times culture.At The Times, our mission and values guide the work we do every day. By acting in their spirit, we serve readers and society, ensure the continued strength of our journalism and business, and foster a healthy and vibrant Times culture. READ OUR MISSION AND VALUES

Our People

The Times attracts talented and passionate people who produce and support the distribution of the world’s best news report — one that is unrivaled in its ambition, breadth and independence. All of us at the company — whether we gather news, explain why our journalism is worth paying for, defend our First Amendment rights or participate in the awe-inspiring ballet of printing and delivering the newspaper to a million doorsteps — know that the integrity of our journalism comes first.

MEET OUR PEOPLE

Our Strategy

Our vision is to become the essential subscription for every curious, English-speaking person seeking to understand and engage with the world.

READ OUR STRATEGY

Explore Our Company

History

Awards and Recognition

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Standards and Ethics

By the Numbers

2,000+Journalism operation as of Q4 2021

55Languages spoken by staff

10+ milTotal subscriptions

236Countries with our subscribers as of Q3 2022

Explore Further

Careers

Journalism

Standards and Ethics

item.title: Journalism
item.dc:creator: marouane216
item.content:encoded:
Journalism

Reporters and editors on deadline in October 2017 just before The Times published its first article detailing accusations of sexual harassment against the film mogul Harvey Weinstein. Susanne Craig for The New York Times

We hire expert journalists and allow them the time and resources to create in-depth, independent, original reporting in the public interest. We provide the context and analysis that readers need to better understand what’s happening around them. We have lawyers covering law, doctors covering health, former U.S. Marines covering war, and economists and M.B.A.s covering the economy.

From our headquarters in New York to Houston and Silicon Valley, from the U.S./Mexico border to Baghdad, we report without fear or favor, and our investigations result in concrete, meaningful action, whether it’s sexual harassment, workplace culture and ethics or government programs and corruption.

While our news coverage helps people understand the world, our Opinion report helps people imagine the world as it could be, through rich discussion and intelligent debate. Our Opinion journalists are experts in their fields who offer informed viewpoints on significant issues.

Our breadth of coverage reaches well beyond news and politics. Since our inception, The Times has been a thoughtful and deep resource for topics that touch our readers’ daily lives.

Audiences around the world look to The Times for our trusted guidance on where to travel, what to read, what show to see on Broadway and where to stop for a bite beforehand. From books to dining, theater to film, our critics’ reviews are often the only reviews that matter.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P2X84JZINcI&embeds_euri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%2F&embeds_origin=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost&source_ve_path=Mjg2NjQ&feature=emb_imp_woytOne Building; Dozens Killed in Syria: How Bashar al-Assad Gassed His Own People

Times storytelling reaches well beyond the written word. From our award-winning photography to our immersive graphics and interactives, The Times sets the standard for multimedia storytelling excellence.

The Times brings stories to life in audio and visual features. We formed an audio team in early 2017 and quickly became a leading podcast producer with our hit, “The Daily.” Listeners press PLAY every day to join our journalists in untangling Washington politics, decoding popular culture, exploring emotional terrain and more.

In addition to the spoken word, Times Video reveals a dynamic view of the world, from reporting on global conflicts to the latest revelations in style, sports and science, some of which audiences experience in 360° with immersive virtual reality and augmented reality features.

Journalists on the Ground

Mexico City bureau chief Azam Ahmed reporting as migrants make their way from Arriaga to Chahuites. Daniel Berehulak for The New York Times

MEET SOME OF OUR JOURNALISTS

More Great Journalism

The Times also provides service journalism that enriches the lives of our readers and helps them navigate everyday decisions.

Explore Further

Newsroom

History

Company

We provide the context and analysis that readers need to better understand what\u2019s happening around them. We have lawyers covering law, doctors covering health, former U.S. Marines covering war, and economists and M.B.A.s covering the economy.<\/p>

From our headquarters in New York to Houston and Silicon Valley, from the U.S.\/Mexico border to Baghdad, we report without fear or favor, and our investigations result in concrete, meaningful action, whether it\u2019s sexual harassment, workplace culture and ethics or government programs and corruption.<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"23e13e6","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"033c3f6","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

While our news coverage helps people understand the world, our Opinion report helps people imagine the world as it could be, through rich discussion and intelligent debate. Our Opinion journalists are experts in their fields who offer informed viewpoints on significant issues.<\/p>

Our breadth of coverage reaches well beyond news and politics. Since our inception, The Times has been a thoughtful and deep resource for topics that touch our readers\u2019 daily lives.<\/p>

Audiences around the world look to The Times for our trusted guidance on where to travel, what to read, what show to see on Broadway and where to stop for a bite beforehand. From books to dining, theater to film, our critics\u2019 reviews are often the only reviews that matter.<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"b1353f4","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"21"},"elements":[{"id":"8e1bd59","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":33,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false},{"id":"7ca2668","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":66,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"e6ba98b","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=P2X84JZINcI&embeds_euri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%2F&embeds_origin=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost&source_ve_path=Mjg2NjQ&feature=emb_imp_woyt","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"},{"id":"e86cd83","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

One Building; Dozens Killed in Syria: How Bashar al-Assad Gassed His Own People<\/span><\/div>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"5814959","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20"},"elements":[{"id":"636b55a","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"12ad705","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Times storytelling reaches well beyond the written word. From our award-winning photography to our immersive graphics and interactives, The Times sets the standard for multimedia storytelling excellence.<\/p>

The Times brings stories to life in audio and visual features. We formed an audio team in early 2017 and quickly became a leading podcast producer with our hit, \u201cThe Daily.\u201d Listeners press PLAY every day to join our journalists in untangling Washington politics, decoding popular culture, exploring emotional terrain and more.<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"4cb4da7","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"e6ef397","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

In addition to the spoken word, Times Video reveals a dynamic view of the world, from reporting on global conflicts to the latest revelations in style, sports and science, some of which audiences experience in 360\u00b0 with immersive virtual reality and augmented reality features.<\/span><\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"b703824","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"bbfdf1e","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"512fda3","elType":"widget","settings":{"text":"S\u00e9parateur"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"divider"},{"id":"b6abfc9","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"
